subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: In his youth, living in a township under apartheid, the idea that Makgaya Ntini might play one test match, let alone 100 for South Africa, would have seemed absurd.
snippet: In his youth, living in a township under apartheid, the idea that Makgaya Ntini might play one test match, let alone 100 for South Africa, would have seemed absurd.
